game.name: Undertaker
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The veil between life and death is shattered. Corpses walk, the earth trembles, and chaos reigns. As the Undertaker, your duty is clear return the dead to the dead by any means necessary. Inspired by classic FPS games like DOOM and Blood fast-paced action in a world gone mad.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The veil between life and death is shattered. Corpses walk, the earth trembles, and chaos reigns. As the Undertaker, your duty is clear return the dead to the dead by any means necessary. Inspired by classic FPS games like DOOM and Blood fast-paced action in a world gone mad.
